Drinking Games. Online.

Drinking Games

— Power Hour —

Power hour is a simple yet challenging drinking game. The objective is to drink one shot of beer each minute for an hour. Make it to the end and you'll have downed 7-8 beers. Give it a try with our free online power hour timer!

— Kings Cup —

Kings cup is a fun social drinking game. Players take turns drawing cards from a deck. Each card has an associated mini game. Example: When a 4 is drawn women drink. Give it a try with our free virtual king's cup deck!

— Beer Pong —

Beer pong is one of the most well known social drinking games. Teams take turns tossing ping pong balls into beer filled cups. The main objective is to eliminate the other team's cups by landing a ball in every cup. Checkout our beer pong page for a list of rules and instructions!

— Boxing —

Boxing is a fun team based game. The game works best with teams of 2, but can be played with teams of 1. Boxers (drinkers) compete in 3 minute rounds until the opposing boxer pukes or quits. The cornermen (non drinking team members) help fill shot glasses during rounds and provide much needed moral support. Give it a try with our free virtual boxing dice!

— Flip Cup —

Flip cup is a fast moving, beer chugging game that should only take a few minutes to complete. This game works best with large teams of four or more. Great for getting a party started, or taking a break for other games. Checkout our flip cup page for a list of rules and instructions!
